info.title: Nodens API - Swagger UI
info.description:
This is the API Documentation for Nodens.
All the routes and Schemas can change until a first version of the proyect in production.Even this file.
Repo Links:
- [Nodens Backend](https://github.com/moises-ph/Nodens_Backend)
- [Nodens Frontend](https://github.com/moises-ph/Nodens_Frontend)

post.description: Get Credentials for logining in Nodens

requestBody.description: The requested data to Log In

401.description: Wrong Password or an Unexpected Error

put.description: Renew the token (The token expires at 15 minutes)

post.description:
This is the first step to recovery the password, here you request a change to the password.
The system creates a session of 30 minutes to change the password, after that time the user will have to do the request another time

404.description: The Email given was not found, the user doesn't exists

400.description: No Email was sent or is invalid

200.description: Succesful request to recovery the password

post.description: This is the second step to recovery the password, here you recieve the token to change the password.

401.description: The Session expired, the credentials ar not valid or an Unexpected Error

example.msg: Url Expirada, por favor vuelva a pedir el restablecimiento de contraseña

put.description: This is the las step, here you send the token given in the step before in the headers like an authentication, and send the password in the URL Query

404.description: The URL Expired, the session is running up until the password changes (this step)

example.msg: Url expirada, por favor vuelva a pedir el restablecimiento de contraseña

400.description: The step before wasn't done or the credentials are not valid

example.msg: Vuelva a solicitar el restablecimiento de su contraseña

500.description: There was an error tring to change the password (all the validations at this point are correct)

401.description: There was an Unexpected Error during the process

put.description: This URL normally is sended to the email, but it's also in the response when the user get register in the platform. Here you send some credentials to validate the Email, the credentials expires in 1 hour

404.description: The URL Expired, basically the credentials exired after 1 hour

post.summary: Request a Verification for the Email
post.description: Request a new Verification Link to Verify the User, usually this happens when the URL Sended when Register expires

requestBody.description: The Email for Request a Verification URL

404.description: The Email or the User doesn't exists

example.Message: El usuario no existe, por favor regístrese
Verificación de email solicitada correctamente, vaya al enlace

delete.description: The PUT route verifies the access permission with an auth token and the id. If the permission is valid, it will delete the musician

post.summary: Upload Videos or Images to Musician's profile
post.description:
This route requires Auth Token in headers and multipart/form-data mimetype in Headers also. Send a tuple with key of the video or image and the file in the body (the key can be whatever, it doesn't affect the process). 
 Also can take several seconds or even minutes to response.

400.description: MIME Type Error or not authorized Rol

example.message: No valid MIME Type for content

post.description:
This route requires Auth Token in headers and multipart/form-data mimetype in Headers also. Send a tuple with only one value: key of the image and the file in the body (the key can be whatever, it doesn't affect the process). 
 Also can take several seconds or even minutes to response.

200.description: Succesful profile Upload or Update of the Musician

400.description: MIME Type Erro or not authorized Rol

example.message: No valid MIME Type for content
